perturbation.original_text: The initial term of this Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and shall continue until the fifth (5th) anniversary of the Effective Date (the “Term”), unless the Agreement is sooner terminated in accordance with the terms of this Agreement. Upon the expiration of the Term, the Term shall automatically extend for successive 12-month periods until one Party terminates the Agreement by providing at least 180 days prior written notice to the other Party prior to the expiration of the then-current term or unless sooner terminated in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: The initial term of this Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and shall continue until the fifth (5th) anniversary of the Effective Date (the “Term”), unless the Agreement is sooner terminated in accordance with the terms of this Agreement. Upon the expiration of the Term, the Term shall automatically extend for successive 12-month periods. There will be no prior written notice to the other Party prior to the expiration of the then-current term, and there are no conditions of termination except in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stated that the contract auto-renews unless one party terminates the agreement by providing at least 180 days prior written notice to the other party. The modified text removes this condition by stating that there will be no prior written notice to the other Party, and there are no conditions of termination. This creates an in-text contradiction and uncertainty in enforcement, as it implies automatic renewal without the possibility of termination through prior written notice.

perturbation.original_text: Eutectix warrants that the Product (i) will conform to the Specifications, (ii) will be free from manufacturing defects (including all defects in workmanship and any defects in materials that were not specified by Liquidmetal or Customer), ) will be free and clear of all liens, encumbrances, charges, claims, or adverse interests of any kind, (iii) will comply with, in all stages of manufacture and distribution to Liquidmetal or Customer, the terms of Section 10. The foregoing representations and warranties shall survive delivery, inspection and payment and shall run in favor of Liquidmetal and its Affiliates, and their respective successors, assigns and customers, both direct and indirect.
perturbation.changed_text: Eutectix warrants that the Product (i) will conform to the Specifications, (ii) will be free from manufacturing defects (including all defects in workmanship and any defects in materials that were not specified by Liquidmetal or Customer), ) will be free and clear of all liens, encumbrances, charges, claims, or adverse interests of any kind, (iii) will comply with, in all stages of manufacture and distribution to Liquidmetal or Customer, the terms of Section 10. The foregoing representations and warranties will not survive delivery, inspection and payment and shall run only in favor of Liquidmetal.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly stated that the representation and warranties survive delivery, inspection and payment and shall run in favor of Liquidmetal and its Affiliates, and their respective successors, assigns and customers, both direct and indirect. The modified version negates survival and the representation is only in favor of Liquidmetal. By stating "will not survive delivery, inspection and payment and shall run only in favor of Liquidmetal" this creates uncertainty about warranty applicability to Liquidmetal's affiliates and customers, contradicting the initial statement.

perturbation.original_text: The Recipient may only disseminate the Discloser’s Confidential Information to its Representatives who have been informed of the Recipient’s obligations under this Agreement and are bound by an obligation of confidentiality and non-use with respect to the Discloser’s Confidential Information at least as broad in scope as the Recipient’s obligations under this Agreement. The Recipient agrees to reasonably restrict disclosure of the Discloser’s Confidential Information to the smallest number of the Recipient’s Representatives which have a need to know the Confidential Information. The Recipient shall be responsible for enforcing this Agreement as the Recipient’s Representatives and shall take such action (legal or otherwise) to the extent necessary to cause them to comply with this agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: The Recipient may disseminate the Discloser’s Confidential Information to its Representatives without any restrictions, irrespective of whether the Representatives have been informed of the Recipient’s obligations under this Agreement. The Recipient is not obligated to restrict disclosure to the smallest number of Representatives. The Recipient is not responsible for enforcing this Agreement as the Recipient’s Representatives.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specified that confidential information may only be shared with representatives who are informed of confidentiality obligations and that the Recipient is responsible for enforcing the agreement. By stating that the information can be shared "without any restrictions" and that the Recipient is not obligated to enforce the agreement, it creates uncertainty about the enforcement and scope of the confidentiality agreement.
